name: Mysteries of Neverville: The Runestone of Light
description: Play a thrilling hidden object adventure and solve the mystery of Neverville and find the stolen runestone of light.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Graphics: 128MB Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
